serviceCacheBuilder

ServiceCacheBuilder<T> serviceCacheBuilder()
Allocate a new service cache builder. The refresh padding is defaulted to 1 second.

Returns:
new cache builder

queryForInstance

ServiceInstance<T> queryForInstance(String name,
                                    String id)
                                    throws Exception
Return a service instance POJO

Parameters:
name - name of the service
id - ID of the instance
Returns:
the instance or null if not found
Throws:
Exception - errors

serviceProviderBuilder

ServiceProviderBuilder<T> serviceProviderBuilder()
Allocate a new builder. ServiceProviderBuilder.providerStrategy(com.netflix.curator.x.discovery.ProviderStrategy) is set to RoundRobinStrategy and ServiceProviderBuilder.refreshPaddingMs(int) is set to 1 second.

Returns:
the builder
